question:
A friend you made while you were studying abroad has written to ask you for help in finding a job in your country. You have heard about a job in a local company that might be suitable for him/her.
Write a letter to this friend. In your letter:
1) Tell your friend about the job and what sort of work it involves
2) Say why you think the job would be suitable for him/her
3) Explain how to apply for the job
text: I hope you are having a good time. I'm writing this letter to inform you that, I have found a perfect job for you in my city. I did some research and then I'm referring it to you. Let me provide you the details.

It's a local company called "Tulip Corporation", and it specializes in real estate finance. This company is quite famous amongst urban and rural citizens, but their next target are the immigrants; those aspiring to buy their own property in this country. Thus, they are in need of a translator who can handle the department of foreign finance. Basic work requirements are; firstly, applicant must be fluent in at least two foreign languages. Secondly, contender is required to be expert in communication skills and lastly, candidate must have a Diploma or Bachelor's degree in Economics. In order to apply for the job, you have to upload your resume to website and they will conduct an online interview.

I think it is the best opportunity for you because their work profile fits perfectly with your educational qualification. Furthermore, company is favoring foreign person over the local applicants as they think that a foreigner can relate with potential clients in a positive way. But, the biggest plus point is salary as well as accommodation. Salary is negotiable and firm is ready to provide you a place to stay. Still the decision is in your hands.
I will be awainting for your reply.
